Alice Patrick (amụrụ n'afọ 1948) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe na onye na-ese onyinyo
Ọbọdọ Los Angeles na-amata ihe osise ya dị ka nke mbụ nwanyị Africa-America sere n'ime ọbọdọ ahụ.
A mụrụ Patrick ma zụlite ya na Los Angeles ebe ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ mbụ na Art Center College of Design ma mesịa na Otis Art Institute Ọ bụkwa ónyé bụbu ónyé nkụzi nka ụlọ akwụkwọ elementrị.

Patrick bụ akụkụ nke Citywide Mural Project na Los Angeles. O sere ihe na South Los Angeles, Otú ọ dị, mgbidi ya nke ụmụ nwanyị akụkọ ihe méré eme na Black History, nke e dechara n'etiti afọ ndị 1970, bibiri n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbè ọ gwụchara. Otu n'ime mgbidi ya ndị ọzọ, "Women Do Get Weary (but They Don't Give Up" (1991) bụ nke Social and Public Art Resource Center (SPARC) kwadoro. Ihe osise ahụ na-egosi ihe oyiyi nke Mary McCleod Bethune, Dorothy Height, Oprah Winfrey, Josephine Baker na ndị ọzọ. Patrick sere onwe ya n'ime mgbidi ahụ. Mgbidi ahụ dị ihe dị ka mita itoolu site na mita iri na isii ma na-ese ya na acrylic na stucco. N'afọ 2013, SPARC weghachiri mgbidi ahụ iji dozie ihe osise ahụ na-acha anụnụ anụnụ.

N'afọ ndị 1990 Patrick na-ere obere mbipụta nke ndị na-eme ngagharị iwe na-etinye aka na mmegharị ikike ọbọdọ. Cooper's Originals, ụlọ ngosi ihe nkiri dị na Los Angeles, nyèrè aka kwalite ọrụ ya, na-ere ihe osise ya. Mgbè e mesịrị, ọ meghere ụlọ ngosi nke ya a na-akpọ Aliceland, nke ọ gbara afọ iri.
